snippet.title: Wildagotchi: Virtual Pet | Premiere Trailer | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Choose your favorite animal, take care of it, and watch it grow in real-time. These adorable pixel-art creatures will definitely steal your heart.

Eshop: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/wildagotchi-virtual-pet-switch/

Don't forget to follow us on 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedDeer_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedDeerGames
and Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reddeer_games/
